row.Body: I've had problems with JavaHL in Eclipse Ganymede, when it worked fine in Eclipse Europa. I'm not sure how Aptana is different, but try either upgrading JavaHL or switching to the pure-java SVNKit implementation within the Subclipse config.
How do you page through a collection in LINQ given that you have a startIndex and a count?
row.Title: Paging a collection with LINQ
